Learn

Online classes

Join the group classes we have online together! We are learning Norwegian from scratch (A1-A2 level). We go through important grammar and vocabulary with fun materials and intriguing lessons. This is for anyone who want to talk with each other and have fun with the learning.

Norwegian Language

This website contains blogs about Norwegian language and culture, fun ways to be able to learn how to speak Norwegian naturally. Blogs about "thank you in Norwegian" -> "Takk skal du ha" etc. and a lot of other good Norwegian vocabulary!
